name: FEJI - Impossible Platformer Game
description:
FEJI Impossible Platformer Game

Struggle in this (almost) impossible platformer game.

Use buttons written on the robot to move his legs.

Made for the 'So Bad It's Good' Jam 2020.

Controls: 'F' 'E' 'J' 'I' for separate joints and movements.

Tips,

1.  F+E or J+I to run and jump.

2. Double tap E / I for walking.

3. To get over a hurdle, I would F+E to leap, then J / I to put up another leg.

4. Again, if you get the first coin, it's already really impressive. The game is of course beatable, but would take some time to try.

Walkthrough:

https://youtu.be/utV5SiH0RyU
